attributes.action: Stop arresting people for online comments
attributes.additional_details:
Arresting people for "trolling" in relation to offence (which is taken not given) is a counter productive response. There are ideas that are repulsive to have in this country, but people have a right to their views (I may not agree with what you have to say but I shall defend to the death your right to say it) and that must not be infringed (and waste police resources). All banning a form of speech ensures is that you will not hear the speech until it is too late. 
Source: https://goo.gl/ZEF7Mo
attributes.background: In this society, all people are free to say anything they want. Unless that something is deemed "offensive" which is a term that has no and can have no true definition. Harassment is defined, but offence is not.

rejection.details:
If you'd like Parliament to change the law, you could start a new petition calling for the specific change you'd like to see.

You may wish to sign this petition:
